availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, attorney. New Hampshire native. Married to Susan A. Palmer. Father of Mary E. Palmer, Ed D. Palmer, Louis P. Palmer, Thomas. F. Palmer and Solaner Palmer.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 748
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 187A
Find A Grave, Philander Palmer (December 8, 1819-March 6, 1880), Memorial #33080138, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/33080138 (accessed August 28, 2019).
